sentences.en: " It's an incredibly stupid, wasteful thing to have happened, " Holtz says.
sentences.cn: “ 已发生的事情是愚蠢透顶, 枉费心机的. ” 霍尔茨说.

sentences.en: If this method of progress seems chancy and wasteful, it has the merit of its faults.
sentences.cn: 如果这种进步的方法好像太碰机会,也太浪费了, 它的缺点也不无利益的功绩.

sentences.en: Ignorant love is impaired ( harmful ). Ignorant spending is wasteful.
sentences.cn: 无知的爱是伤害, 无知的消费是浪费.

sentences.en: In addition to being wasteful, duplication may be inconvenient and irritating to consumers.
sentences.cn: 重复投资不仅造成浪费, 也会给消费者带来不便和激起不满.

sentences.en: It is a shame to be so wasteful.
Most restaurants use large gas ovens and stoves which can be wasteful.
sentences.cn: 而大多数餐馆使用巨大的汽炉及烤炉,这样很不经济.

sentences.en: Neat people place neatness above everything even economics. They are incredibly wasteful.
sentences.cn: 爱整洁的人视整洁高于一切,甚至金钱. 他们非常浪费.

sentences.en: Such fences were fairly functional, but were unattractive and wasteful of land.
sentences.cn: 这种篱笆虽然实用, 却不美观,并且占地多.

sentences.en: The Empire again fragmented, and a wasteful Imperial Civil War broke out.
sentences.cn: 帝国再一次分裂, 一场无谓的帝国内战随之爆发.

sentences.en: The immediate consequence with wasteful resource is pollution serious.
sentences.cn: 资源浪费的直接后果是污染严重.

sentences.en: The software is very wasteful of memory.
The whole process is wasteful and inefficient.
sentences.cn: 整个程序既浪费又效率低。

sentences.en: This is wasteful because it deprives the soil of valuable nutrients.
sentences.cn: 这是一种浪费,因为它夺走了土壤的有价值的养料.

sentences.en: This practice is frowned upon as being wasteful.
sentences.cn: 这种行为被认为是浪费而不获认可。

sentences.en: To his own people, Solomon was a wasteful and oppressive monarch.
sentences.cn: 对他本国人民来说, 所罗门是个挥霍、残暴的君主.

sentences.en: Try to avoid wasteful duplication of effort.
sentences.cn: 尽量避免无用的重复劳动。

words.tran_cn: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
[环境] 废品；挥霍者，浪费者
浪费的，不经济的；奢侈的

trans.tran_en: using more of something than you should, especially money, time, or effort
